bibl.title: The Authorship of the ""Hellenica Oxyrhynchia"".
bibl.note: Makes the case for Theopompos of Chios as author, based among others on re-dating his birth to the late fifth century BC. Arguments that the Hellenika Oxyrhynchia did contain speeches, the evidence of Diodoros' use of the Hellenika Oxyrhynchia and knowledge of Theopompos. - Avec résumés en anglais et en français.
bibl.seg: Richard Billows, The Authorship of the ""Hellenica Oxyrhynchia"".
Catherine Rubincam (ed.), Hellenica Oxyrhynchia after 100 Years = Mouseion (Canada) 9 (2009) pp. 219-238.

Makes the case for Theopompos of Chios as author, based among others on re-dating his birth to the late fifth century BC. Arguments that the Hellenika Oxyrhynchia did contain speeches, the evidence of Diodoros' use of the Hellenika Oxyrhynchia and knowledge of Theopompos. - Avec résumés en anglais et en français.
